Text: The company was buffered by turbulence from a weak Chinese autos sector in Q2 2019, with total revenues up just 8.9%, to 2.79 billion RMB ($390 million U.S.) CFO Ming Xu stated that the company expects to revenues to further slip in Q3, with estimates ranging from a 2.8% decrease to a 0.9% increase year-over-year in the coming quarter.
Cause: The company was buffered by turbulence from a weak Chinese autos sector in Q2 2019, with total revenues up just 8.9%
Effect: 2.79 billion RMB ($390 million U.S.) CFO Ming Xu stated that the company expects to revenues to further slip in Q3, with estimates ranging from a 2.8% decrease to a 0.9% increase year-over-year in the coming quarter.
